normalised: Regarding the recent promotion announcement, it's vital to acknowledge the contributions of each individual. Missus Sharma, formerly Senior Manager, now assumes the role of V-P, Marketing, effective first September two thousand and twenty four. Furthermore, Mister Kumar, previously A-V-P, Sales, has been appointed Director, Business Development. The changes reflect the company's commitment to recognizing talent. These promotions, as outlined by C-E-O, Mister Patel, align with our strategic goals for F-Y-twenty five.
